name: Cahoots!
description:
Cahoots! is the new and exciting trick taking game by designer Jay Treat. In Cahoots!, you must work with an ever changing set of partners to score as many points as you can - while making sure that you don't give any of your partners too many of your hard earned points! If you love trick taking games like Spades, Euchre, and Pitch, then Cahoots! is perfect for you!

Here are what some reviewers are saying about Cahoots!:

"This is currently my favorite trick taking game, digital or tabletop."
- Brad Cummings, BoardGameGeek iOS Editor

"[W]ith many games on my iPhone and iPad, I was pleasantly surprised that I found myself returning to Cahoots for a quick game and started to see some additional tactics."
- James Sheahan, MetaGames

"I have been really enjoying this one..."
-Brett Nolan, appaddict.net

"Every decision you make has an excruciating corollary."
-Matt Thrower, PocketGamer

"It’s a neat game, and I want to put together a physical version to play."
-Dave, daveexmachina.com
